text: tan atiyarkalil tan natiyavar mitu tan arutkotaiyai allah aruliyatarkaka poramaippattu, allah aruliyataiye nirakarittu tankal atmakkalai virru avarkal perruk kontatu mikavum kettatakum. Itanal avarkal (iraivanutaiya) kopattirku mel kopattirku alaki vittarkal. (Ittakaiya) kahpirkalukku ilivana vetanai untu
